price: Sai Lũɗu ya yi ĩmãni da shi. Kuma Ibrãhĩm ya ce: "Lallenĩ mai ƙaura ne zuwa ga Ubangijina. Lalle Shĩ Shĩ ne Mabuwãyi, Mai hikima."
arabic: ۞ فَـَٔامَنَ لَهُۥ لُوطٞۘ وَقَالَ إِنِّي مُهَاجِرٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّيٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: faāmana lahu lūṭun waqāla innī muhājirun ilā rabbī innahu huwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
